name: Ext_R5_Ingredient_su_st_presentation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Ingredient.substance.strength.presentation[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Ingredient.substance.strength.presentation[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Ingredient|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The quantity of substance in the unit of presentation
element.definition: The quantity of substance in the unit of presentation, or in the volume (or mass) of the single pharmaceutical product or manufactured item. Unit of presentation refers to the quantity that the item occurs in e.g. a strength per tablet size, perhaps 'per 20mg' (the size of the tablet). It is not generally normalized as a unitary unit, which would be 'per mg').
element.comment: `Ingredient.substance.strength.presentation[x]` maps to R4B `Ingredient.substance.strength.presentation[x]`. Type `CodeableConcept` has no mapping Type `Quantity` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
